Judul: PROPOSED BUSINESS STRATEGY FOR ENGLISH COURSE BUSINESS (Study Case: E-Cro Course)
Abstrak:
E-Cro Course (ECC) is an English course which emphasizes social entrepreneurship as the philosophy. ECC provides course programs starting from English for kindergarten to University students. ECC also provides English language preparation test and Institution English capacity building. ECC has been running for three years, but its growth is prolonged and even tends to decline. 

Based on management tools and qualitative analysis, the data tells that ECC has several business issues that should be solved which are: Low brand awareness, Highly rivalry among competitors, Weak online presence, and Unclear management system. The analysis tools divided into two categories, external factor analysis, and internal factors analysis. For external factors analysis, the tools used was PEST and Competitor analysis. In internal factor analysis, there are six building blocks by Flamholtz. The interview also conducted to get a customer, management, and expert insight about ECC. 

The researcher proposed business strategy using Timmons model and Six building blocks by Flamholtz. Timmons model used for interview tools and FGD to see the current ECC condition based on customer, management, and expert views in general. How much ECC opportunities in this industry, and how internal factors such as teams and resources support those opportunities. Based on Six building blocks by Flamholtz, several strategies can be implemented to help company solved their business issues and strengthened its business. The proposed strategies refer to the three blocks of Flamholtz's Sources, Operational systems, and Management System. 

Implementation plan then divides into short, medium, and long-term planning to budgeting efficiency. For the short-term and the first strategy need to be done by the ECC is the improvement of operational systems. ECC had the problem of high rivalry amongst competitor, weak online presence, and low brand awareness. For the medium-term strategy, ECC needs to implement resources strategy block, and in long-term strategy, management system needs to do.
Kata Kunci: English Course, Social Entrepreneur, Business Strategy, SOP, Marketing
